properties.areaDesc: Fire Island Inlet NY to Moriches Inlet NY out 20 nm; Moriches Inlet NY to Montauk Point NY out 20 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 9 at 3:18PM EST until February 11 at 6:00AM EST by NWS Upton NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt.
Occasional gusts up to 35 kt are possible. Seas 5 to 8 feet.

* WHERE...Moriches Inlet NY to Montauk Point NY out 20 nm and
Fire Island Inlet NY to Moriches Inlet NY out 20 nm.

* WHEN...From 2 AM Monday to 6 AM EST Tuesday. The strongest
winds will occur Monday Morning and Afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM MONDAY TO 6 AM EST TUESDAY
